name: Lifeless Eyes
summary: Lifeless Eyes is a 2D side-scrolling horror/adventure game made in ten weeks by a group of four people: the-masked-lady as the game designer, producer and art assistant, Enric Garcia and Aleix Briansó as programmers, and me as the main artist. It was our final project for our first year of university.
